content: हीन {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [हा-क्त तस्य नः ईत्वम्] {@--1@} Left, abandoned, forsaken &c. {@--2@} Destitute or deprived of, bereft of, without; (with <ab>instr.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); गुणैर्हीना न शोभंते निगैधा इव किंशुकाः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; so द्रव्य°, मति°, उत्साह° &c. {@--3@} Excluded, shut out from (with <ab>abl.</ab>). {@--4@} Decayed, wasted. {@--5@} Deficient, defective; हीनातिरिक्तगावो वा तमप्यपनयेत्ततः <ls>Ms. 3. 242.</ls> {@--6@} Subtracted. {@--7@} Less, lower; <ls>Ms. 2. 194.</ls> {@--8@} Low, base, mean, vile. --नः {@--1@} A defective witness. {@--2@} A faulty respondent; (Nārada enumerates five kinds:-- अन्यवादी क्रियाद्वेषी नोपस्थायी निरुत्तरः . आहूतप्रपलायी च हीनः पंचविधः स्मृतः). {@--3@} Subtraction.
